items.name: Bubba Brand Voice AI System
items.description: Build an AI-powered brand voice system to ensure consistent Bubba brand messaging across all creative outputs.
items.problem: Bubba's brand voice is inconsistent across different channels and creators, leading to diluted brand identity.
items.solution: Develop a custom AI model trained on approved Bubba brand content to generate and validate brand-consistent messaging.
items.goal: Achieve 95% brand voice consistency score across all creative outputs within 6 months.
items.why: Consistent brand voice strengthens brand recognition, builds trust with consumers, and increases marketing effectiveness by 40%.
items.technicalWorkflowScope: Fine-tune LLM on Bubba brand corpus, build validation API, create Figma/Slack integrations, develop approval workflow
items.dataRequirements: 3+ years of approved marketing copy, social media posts, product descriptions, customer communications, brand guidelines

items.name: Summer Campaign 2024
items.description: Summer campaign focusing on outdoor adventure and sustainability themes for Bubba's new eco-friendly product line.
items.briefContent:
Brief Type

Full campaign - concepting, storyboard, keyframe approval, video production, final edit

Target Audience

Outdoor enthusiasts aged 25-45, environmentally conscious, active lifestyle

Key Message

Adventure responsibly with Bubba's sustainable gear that keeps up with your lifestyle

Deliverables

  • 3x 30-second video ads
  • 12x social media assets (Instagram/TikTok)
  • 6x still images for print/web
  • Campaign landing page design

chatMessages.message: Hey team, can we prioritize @[asset-request:asset-002:Hero Video Ads - Summer]? Client meeting is next week.
On it! Also, @[asset-request:asset-003:Instagram Feed - Summer Collection] needs color grading feedback before we can proceed.
I'll handle the @[asset-request:asset-005:Print/Web Heroes] revisions today. Should have updated comp shots by EOD.
Thanks Mike! Let me know when those are ready and I'll review right away.

items.name: Q2 Social Media Assets
items.description: Generate social media assets for Q2 product launches across multiple platforms and formats.
items.briefContent:
Brief Type

Asset generation - multi-platform social media campaign

Target Audience

Outdoor enthusiasts and lifestyle consumers aged 18-35 across Instagram, TikTok, Pinterest, and YouTube

Key Message

Premium drinkware and coolers built for adventure — show, don't tell

Deliverables

  • 12x Instagram statics
  • 8x TikTok videos (15s)
  • 6x YouTube Shorts (30s)
  • 10x Pinterest pins
  • 12x Meta carousel ads

chatMessages.message: @[asset-request:asset-006:Cooler Product Showcase] is approved and ready for distribution!
Great news! Still working on @[asset-request:asset-007:Drinkware Product Videos] — adjusting audio levels per Jordan's notes.

items.name: Sustainable Product Line Concepts
items.description: Exploratory concept development for new sustainable product line with focus on packaging design and brand positioning.
items.explorationFocus: Packaging innovation, visual identity refresh, storytelling approach for sustainability narrative
items.collaborationType: Rapid iteration sprints with weekly review cycles
